body:
Hello @alanbato! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - In the file [`pandas/core/frame.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/96cc9baabbcbcfd3efae09f3a01425c9f0856bde/pandas/core/frame.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 2046:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/96cc9baabbcbcfd3efae09f3a01425c9f0856bde/pandas/core/frame.py#L2046): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'
> [Line 2480:13](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/96cc9baabbcbcfd3efae09f3a01425c9f0856bde/pandas/core/frame.py#L2480): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'
> [Line 5222:21](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/96cc9baabbcbcfd3efae09f3a01425c9f0856bde/pandas/core/frame.py#L5222): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'
> [Line 5718:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/96cc9baabbcbcfd3efae09f3a01425c9f0856bde/pandas/core/frame.py#L5718): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'





##### Comment last updated on July 15, 2017 at 14:59 Hours UTC
@alanbato : Thanks for this PR!  FYI, ignore the PEP8 bot.  We are experimenting with this.
I did a quick GitHub search for this warning, and I don't see it anywhere in our tests.  Could you add a test that triggers this warning?

> I would like some guidance on how to implement testing for this quick fix. I was thinking on using pytest's warning assertion, but couldn't figure out how to make it elegantly.

Just read this after I submitted my question :smile:  Don't try to use `pytest's` warning assertion, as we have our custom one called `assert_produces_warning` from `pandas.util.testing`.
Sure! should I add it to the `pandas/tests/frame/test_convert_to.py` file below the error assertions? Or should I create a new file?
Yes, absolutely!  That's definitely the right place to put it.
